channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 29 November–6 December 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Parti Socialiste (S&D): 2–3 seats
  • Mouvement Réformateur (RE): 2 seats
  • Centre démocrate humaniste (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Ecolo (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • Parti du Travail de Belgique (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • DéFI (RE): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 29 November–6 December 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 29 November–6 December 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Parti Socialiste (S&D): 21.1–26.0%
  • Mouvement Réformateur (RE): 17.9–22.5%
  • Centre démocrate humaniste (EPP): 6.9–10.1%
  • Ecolo (Greens/EFA): 16.4–20.8%
  • Parti du Travail de Belgique (GUE/NGL): 14.1–18.3%
  • DéFI (RE): 4.8–7.6%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 2–10 September 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 2–10 September 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Parti Socialiste (S&D): 20.5–25.2%
  • Mouvement Réformateur (RE): 19.6–24.3%
  • Centre démocrate humaniste (EPP): 6.6–9.7%
  • Ecolo (Greens/EFA): 15.9–20.3%
  • Parti du Travail de Belgique (GUE/NGL): 13.0–17.1%
  • DéFI (RE): 4.9–7.7%
